game.name: The Inner World
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Inner World – A 2D-Point’n’Click Adventure Together with the help of the mysterious thief Laura, his best intentions and no clue whatsoever, Robert sets off on his adventure to discover the secret of the wind's disappearance. Will the young adventurer be able to save his world?
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Inner World – A 2D-Point’n’Click Adventure Together with the help of the mysterious thief Laura, his best intentions and no clue whatsoever, Robert sets off on his adventure to discover the secret of the wind's disappearance. Will the young adventurer be able to save his world?

reviewHighlights.text: 어거지 그닥 없고 포인트 앤 클릭 좋아하면 무적권
